section.title: What We Do
section.subtitle: We specialize in providing authentic CD IELTS mock test experiences.

services.title: CD IELTS Mock Tests
services.description: Get hands-on experience with real exam formats. Practice in a genuine computer-delivered environment that mirrors the official IELTS test.

services.title: Real-Time Simulation
services.description: Our platform simulates actual test timing and interface. Train your time management skills and build confidence before the real test day.

services.title: Instant Feedback
services.description: Receive detailed analysis of your performance right after your test. Identify your strengths and focus on improving your weaknesses.

services.title: For Students & Professionals
services.description: Whether you're applying for university or immigration, our platform is tailored for all candidates who want top scores in IELTS.

card.title: IELTS Listening Practice Test 1
card.description: Practice listening to a range of conversations and monologues with questions.

card.title: IELTS Academic Reading Test 1
card.description: Develop your ability to read academic texts and answer related questions.

card.title: IELTS Writing Task 1 - Graph Description
card.description: Write a report describing a graph, chart or diagram.
